options: ['the tortoise or the goldfish', 'the tortoise or the dog', 'a dog or a cat', 'the goldfish or the cat']
article:
Hello!
My name is Becky Sharp. I'm eleven years old. I've got one brother--his name's Jonson and he's fourteen. I haven't got any sisters.
I live with my mum , dad and grandma in a small house in Chesterfield,in the north of England. There are lots of things to do here. My friends and I go to the cinema on Saturdays.
Do you like games? I like football. My favorite team is Manchester United. I sometimes play football with my brother. I'm good at it but he isn't very good.
I've got seven pets--a tortoise and six goldfish. I want a dog or a cat,but my mother doesn't like them.
